snippet: Despite signs that the bluefin tuna is in serious decline, the top price paid fell to 7.36 million yen from the record ¥155.4 million a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Despite signs that the bluefin tuna is in serious decline, the top price paid fell to 7.36 million yen from the record ¥155.4 million a year ago.

headline.main: Tuna Prices Retreat at Tokyo Auction
headline.print_headline: Tuna Prices Retreat at Tokyo Auction
